biotools.summary: Web interface for generating hypotheses about gene function, analyzing gene lists and prioritizing genes for functional assays. Users input a query list for extension and weighting with functionally similar genes. Six organisms are supported.

bioschemas.name: GeneMANIA
bioschemas.summary: Web interface for generating hypotheses about gene function, analyzing gene lists and prioritizing genes for functional assays. Users input a query list for extension and weighting with functionally similar genes. Six organisms are supported.
